Package me.dnorris.pool.arena.entity

Class AbstractEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.dnorris.pool.arena.entity.AbstractEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArcShape, CircleEntity, CompoundEntity, LineEntity, RectangleEntity, TextEntity
    public abstract class AbstractEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity
    Abstract implementation of the Entity interface to reduce the amount of repeated code in the lower, more specific, implementations of the Entity interface

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractEntity

        protected AbstractEntity​(java.awt.Color colour,
                         Location location,
                         Hitbox hitbox,
                         Vector motion,
                         boolean hollow)
        Basic constructor that can only be accessed from classes extending this abstract implementation
        Parameters:
        colour - Colour of the entity
        location - Center point of the entity
        hitbox - Entity's hitbox
        motion - The initial motion of the entity
        hollow - If the entity is graphically hollow
